attributes.action: Ban the production of white cars and destroy all current white cars or re paint them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: White cars are a nuissance they look bad they get dirty and they look bad. they also reflect the light in the summer if they are clean and distract from driving. we should not have to suffer for other peoples bad taste in cars

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
